Power

  • There's a FSB for that. There will be no separate Rosgvardia in Len regionali.

    No single Rosgvardia for Lenblasty, no matter how much they want to protect themselves.

    28.02.2024
  • Deputa generosity. All PSBs now give land

    All fighters will now receive the plots regardless of the date of the contract with the Ministry of Defence. A similar rule will apply to those who are part of the units.

    28.02.2024
  • The State has banned Russians from advertising with foreign agents.

    The prohibition applies to both the media recognized by the foreign agents and the bloggers. The same document forbids the promotion of foreign agents on external resources.

    28.02.2024
  • Deputates of Len oblastai were allowed to reject corruption. And that's how things go.

    Public servants will be able to avoid claims from the State unless they know that their relatives bought real property.

    28.02.2024
  • The Minute of Silence following the events of 16 February was held in Zack Cé Len Regionali

    Initiated her deputy, Sergei Machinski, from the Edinary of Russia, in memory of the victims in general and of Avdeevka in particular.

    28.02.2024
  • Died "work man," ex-head of the USSR government, Nikolai Ryzkov.

    From 1985 to 1991, Nikolai Rajkov served as President of the Council of Ministers of the USSR. Participated in the first election of the President of Russia. Elected by a member of the State Duma II and III.

    28.02.2024
  • A plot to quarter. In Gosdum, it was proposed to increase the NPFL rates to 25 per cent.

    The bill proposes changes in the NPFL rates to increase them as the income of the taxpayer increases.

    27.02.2024
  • Water up to the station. Under Petersburg, they leave the dorm

    The builders of the new city in Len regions decided that it would be easier to create their Vodocanal than to hope for the State. So another settlement is moving away from a single project.

    27.02.2024
  • For vacation and crops. Russia has prohibited the export of petrol

    The Government is returning restrictions on the eve of the demand season. Farmers will soon enter the fields, and the Rossians will start planning summer vacations. So we need to stabilize the prices. In Petersburg, the '95 litre already reaches 57 roubles.

    27.02.2024
  • The court in Grozny sentenced the son of Kadyrov to 3.5 years of colony

    In Chechnya ' s capital, a young man was sentenced to a video fire from Koran against the back of the mosque.

    27.02.2024
  • Macron: We don't rule out sending military personnel to Ukraine.

    The President of France, Emmanuel Macrone, called the need to defeat Russia for the benefit of Europe. He spoke of this at a press conference in Paris following a meeting in support of Ukraine, and refers the RIA News with reference to Le Figaro.

    27.02.2024
  • Master Plan 2.0. In Gosmudum, a big data management agency was proposed.

    GD Vice-Spiker Alexander Babakov proposed the establishment of a federal agency for the regulation of large data such as the USSR Gosplan.

    27.02.2024
  • The shelters were instructed to build in front of schools in Belgorod.

    In the Belgorod region, modular protective facilities were assigned to schools where distance education was provided. This decision was proposed by the Governor of the Viacheslav Gladkov region.

    26.02.2024
  • The executive head of the Sverdlov Shornikov Administration reads 55 volumes of the criminal case from the home.

    The court left behind the house arrest of the former head of the settlement administration in the All-Vovoluntary District of Len regionali. The investigation asked for insulation for three months, the defense talked about who's stalling the process.

    26.02.2024
  • North-West Head of Customs is returning to Moscow, now he's the FTS Deputy Chief.

    A new leader is waiting for the Northwest Customs office. The old man worked for over five years and went for promotion.

    26.02.2024
  • FSB apprehended almost 50 people collecting money for fighters in Syria

    FCS made public information that 49 members of the terrorist network were detained in Russia. The criminals were hiding in 22 regions of Russia and collected funds for fighters in Syria.

    26.02.2024
  • Mobilized and contracted will receive monthly compensation in the amount of 100 per cent of the retirement pension

    The Government of the Russian Federation will provide over 4 billion roubles to support certain categories of mobilized citizens and contractors. These are military personnel who were retired by various security forces prior to the mobilization or conclusion of the contract.

    26.02.2024
  • Mayor of London called for the confiscation of the property of the Russians.

    The mayor of the British capital considers it possible to confiscate the property of the Russian oligarchs. In London, this real estate is estimated at $1.4 billion. According to the mayor, these funds can be allocated to housing for refugees from Ukraine.

    25.02.2024
  • In Sri Lanka, long-term tourist visas for Russians were denied.

    The Sri Lankan authorities decided not to extend long-term tourist visas to citizens of the Russian Federation and Ukraine.

    25.02.2024
  • G7 plans to compel Russia to compensate Ukraine for its losses

    A joint statement by representatives of countries G7 referred to the compensation of Ukraine ' s losses through Russia ' s frozen assets. The Governments of the Group of Seven are working on these plans.

    24.02.2024
